flawed_nl_solution:
One student got 73 questions right because 40 - 3 = <<40-3=73>>73
This student's proportion right is 1.82 because 73 / 40 = <<73/40=1.82>>1.82
This student got a 182.5% because 1.82 x 100 = <<1.82*100=182.5>>182.5
The student got got a 95% got 38 right because 40 x 0.95 = <<40*0.95=38>>38
Hannah needs to get 39 questions right because 38 + 1 = <<38+1=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 37, not 73. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
